
Here the order of bases is 'A', 'G', 'C', 'T'. 

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(feather)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(bsselectR)
path <- '../pattern/{model}/motif_visualization/'
info <- c('{model}', 'motif_visualization')
plots <- list()
for(i in 1 : {nmotifs}){
    p <- plot_motif(filename = paste(path, '/Motif_', i, '.feather', sep = ''), i)
    plots <- save_plot(info, p, paste('Motif', i, sep = '.'), 'plots', plots)
}
bsselect(plots, type = "img", selected = names(plots)[1],
         live_search = TRUE, show_tick = TRUE, height = 10)
```
